fields.name: chest
fields.label: Chest
fields.description: Diagonal fold, one half the distance for men and one third of distance for females, between anterior axillary line and nipple.

fields.name: abdomen
fields.label: Abdomen
fields.description: Vertical fold, 2 cm to the right side of umbilicus.

fields.name: thigh
fields.label: Thigh
fields.description: Vertical fold on the anterior midline of the thigh, half way between the proximal border of the patella and the hip.

fields.name: triceps
fields.label: Triceps
fields.description: Vertical fold on the posterior midline of the upper arm, halfway between the bony processes (shoulder and elbow). The arm should be held freely to the side of the body.

fields.name: axilla
fields.label: Axilla
fields.description: Vertical fold on the midaxillary line at the level of the xiphoid process of the sternum.

fields.name: subscapula
fields.label: Subscapula
fields.description: Diagonal 45 degrees fold, 1-2 cm below the angle of the scapula.

fields.name: suprailiac
fields.label: Suprailiac
fields.description: Diagonal fold, immediately superior and in line with the angle of the iliac crest, on the anterior axillary line.
